description: Nuclear energy will allow Singapore to continue developing energy-intensive industries and generate high-quality skilled jobs for future generations. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Small, modular power plants in Singapore may be a reality soon but more research required
title_page: Small, modular power plants in Singapore may be a reality soon but more research required | The Straits Times
maintext:
The advent of newer and safer technologies in the nuclear industry will allow Singapore to meet its growing energy needs and carbon-neutral ambitions by 2050.
Advanced small modular reactors (SMRs) and floating nuclear power plants (FNPPs) are increasingly seen as potential “game changers” for small, land-constrained countries.
